ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lnof.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | lnof.2 | |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lnof.7 | |- L = ( U LnOp W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` U ) = ( +v ` U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +v ` W ) = ( +v ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .sOLD ` U ) = ( .sOLD ` U ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .sOLD ` W ) = ( .sOLD ` W ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7, 3 | #P_islno | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( T e. L <-> ( T : X --> Y /\ A. x e. CC A. y e. X A. z e. X ( T ` ( ( x ( .sOLD ` U ) y ) ( +v ` U ) z ) ) = ( ( x ( .sOLD ` W ) ( T ` y ) ) ( +v ` W ) ( T ` z ) ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simprbda | |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) /\ T e. L ) -> T : X --> Y ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3impa | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ T e. L ) -> T : X --> Y ) |
